page.title: 17Holy Trinity Church
page.content: Parochial Church Council This exists to enable the laity to accept responsible in helping the priest run the parish. At an Annual Parochial Church meeting members (who must be on the Parish Electoral Roll) are elected to the PCC. At the Annual Church Meeting held on 29th March l985, the following were elected. Churchwardens: Mr.Peter Arthbuthnot Mr. Norman Swaffer Deanery Synod Representatives: Mrs. S. Smith & Mrs. A. Phipps PCC Representatives: Mr. R. Butter Lt.Col.Pounds, Mrs.Axford, Mr.Smith, Mr.& Mrs. Wadey, Mr. Prideaux, Mrs. Wood, Miss Hazel, Mrs. Bamford. Sidesmen: Mesdames Turner, Ogg, Saul, Pounds, Laidler, Messrs.Ogg, Loverage, Smith, Turner, Wadey, Messer Bennetts, Bamford.
